name: HackNBlocks
description:
A lot of fun with a classic type bi-side puzzle game, with a hacking theme, with 3 game mode:

*Challenges

Up to 50 puzzles to solve, with a progressive curve of difficulty, that would test your skills !

*Survival

How much time can you survive before the system detects you? How much chains and combos of hacked chips can you do? Give it a try !!

*Versus

Challenge your friends in the competitive survival mode, to see who is the best. Be the best puzzle hacker among your friends !

Share your progress at twitter and facebook too !

Can you beat the mainframe?
